title: Netflix already supports the global Galaxy S22 series Exynos 2200 chip
content:
Although not yet officially unveiled, Netflix has already confirmed that upcoming global Galaxy S22 models with the Exynos 2200 will be supported by the streaming service.

more…

The post Netflix already supports the global Galaxy S22 series Exynos 2200 chip appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Netflix has already confirmed that upcoming global Galaxy S22 models with the Exynos 2200 will be supported by the streaming service.
